MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Greasby, affecting properties in Padstow Road. Coleman Drive, Langstone Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 1:32PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work required and our team is now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30PM. We will update this message if the information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45PM on Saturday 23rd January2021.
